title: H&HW Included | 1 bed 1 bath | Packards Corner and B line
posting_body: This one-bedroom, one-bathroom abode is perfect for anyone looking for a convenient and vibrant location.
You'll be just one block away from the B Line, making it easy to get around the city, and two blocks from Whole Foods, ensuring that you always have access to fresh groceries.
If you're a music lover, you'll love living so close to Brighton Music Hall; and if you're a student at Boston University, campus is nearby.
Plus, with three stops on the T from Packards Corner, getting around town is a breeze.
Parking is available on the street with a permit and laundry is literally next door to this apartment.
Come see this wonderful apartment today!
First, Last, Security, and Broker Fee to move in.
